Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Trim tab actuator binding. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 11/05/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
